name: Ageless Love

Official sites: Ageless Love "Featuring Scotch Plains Actor Impresses at Cannes Film Festival - https://nj1015.com/ageless-love-featuring-scotch-plains-actor-impresses-at-cannes/

description: The incredible true story of an odd Jewish couple (Yale Schwartz and Nina Lemisch) who fought against the social norms of the late 1960's in order to find true happiness.
